dsml_ai_meetup_2019.title: DSML AI Meetup (2019)
dsml_ai_meetup_2019.subtitle: 6th DSML Meetup - Large-scale AI event
dsml_ai_meetup_2019.description: A large-scale event dedicated to artificial intelligence, held at Nazarbayev University with support from Astana Business Campus. The event included both technical talks and tutorials as well as visionary sessions and conference reviews.

ai_meetup_astana_2018.title: AI Meetup Astana (2018)
ai_meetup_astana_2018.subtitle: The first AI event in Kazakhstan
ai_meetup_astana_2018.description: The 5th DSML community meetup and the first event in Kazakhstan dedicated to artificial intelligence. The event was held at Astana Hub and included both theoretical talks and tutorials on text generation as well as visionary sessions.

total_meetup_2018.title: Total Meetup (Almaty, 2018)
total_meetup_2018.subtitle: Fourth DSML Meetup
total_meetup_2018.description: The fourth DSML meetup held in Almaty at Smart Point, featuring comprehensive presentations on various aspects of data science and machine learning.
